resources.string: The text below is in different languages that is translated using Phrase. Paste a text on the EditText field to translate to the target language of your choice. See https://cloud.google.com/translate/docs/languages for list of targeted language code
“O to akoko fun awọn obi lati kọ awọn ọdọ ni ibẹrẹ lori pe ni oniruuru ẹwa wa ati agbara wa.” - Maya Angelou
J\'ai été tenté de nommer cette bibliothèque polygot
Nunca renuncies a un sueño por el tiempo que se requiere para lograrlo. El tiempo pasará de todas formas.
Tsukideta kugi wa tsuchi de utareru
